Introduction

INFINITE H (Korean: 인피니트H; Japanese: インフィニットH) was a sub-unit of the boy group INFINITE formed under Woollim Entertainment back in 2013. The duo consists of rappers, Dongwoo and Hoya.

Following the departure of Hoya from Woollim Entertainment, INFINITE H's future is uncertain.
